name: review-request
description: Multi-agent code review for PRs: parallel specialized reviewers → consolidation → PR feedback
description_long: Comprehensive code review workflow that dispatches specialized reviewer agents in parallel (code quality, correctness, C++ performance, Python performance, security), consolidates findings to remove duplicates and rank by severity, then posts structured feedback to the PR as overview and inline comments.

steps.name: Review
steps.description: Multi-agent code review: parallel specialized reviewers → consolidation → feedback posting
steps.prompt:
Review PR for code quality, correctness, performance, and security.

Arguments: $ARGUMENTS

Perform comprehensive multi-agent code review:
1. Analyze changed files (identify C++ and Python files)
2. Dispatch specialized reviewers in parallel
3. Consolidate findings (dedupe, rank, filter)
4. Post overview comment and inline comments to PR
